com.icesoft.faces.component.ext
Class HtmlDataTable

java.lang.Object
  javax.faces.component.UIComponent
      javax.faces.component.UIComponentBase
          javax.faces.component.UIData
              javax.faces.component.html.HtmlDataTable
                  com.icesoft.faces.component.panelseries.UISeries
                      com.icesoft.faces.component.ext.HtmlDataTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.icesoft.faces.utils.SeriesStateHolder, javax.faces.component.NamingContainer, javax.faces.component.StateHolder
public class HtmlDataTable
extends UISeries

This is an extension of javax.faces.component.html.HtmlDataTable, which provides some additional behavior to this component such as:

  • changes the component's rendered state based on the authentication
  • maintain the sorting order, for a column within the dataTable
